New Records: Shadab Khan scored 36 runs off 26 balls and took 1 wicket; Rashid Khan scored 18 runs off 15 balls
Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 1 wicket with 4 balls remaining; Shadab Khan's all-around performance; Rashid Khan's quickfire 18 runs; several reviews and close calls during the match
Post-Match Reflections: Shadab Khan was named Player of the Match; Pakistan earned 2 points in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 10th in the Super Four stage; played at Sharjah Cricket Stadium
Others: Umpires: Anil Chaudhary, Jayaraman Madanagopal, Gazi Sohel; Match referee: Andy Pycroft
